MAN.TITLE: cmp
MAN.SHORT_DESCRIPTION: Performs per-element comparison of two arrays.

PARAM_ITEM.PARAM_DESCRIPTION:
Mode of comparaison,The flag specifying the relation between the elements to be checked:
- CMP_EQ - CMP_GT - CMP_GE - CMP_LT - CMP_GE - CMP_NE

DESCRIPTION.P:
cmpCompare twos arrays with differents modes :
CMP_EQ - ima_A(I) "equal to" ima_B(I) CMP_GT - ima_A(I) "greater than" ima_B(I) CMP_GE - ima_A(I) "greater or equal" ima_B(I) CMP_LT - ima_A(I) "less than" ima_B(I) CMP_GE - ima_A(I) "less or equal" ima_B(I) CMP_NE - ima_A(I) "not equal to" ima_B(I)
The function cmp compares the corresponding elements of two arrays and fills the destination mask array: ima_out(I)=ima_A(I) op ima_B(I),
where op is '=', '>', '>=', '<', '<=' or '!='.

MAN.SECTION:
The latest version of SIVP can be found at
http://sivp.sourceforge.net
